translation.en: Sorry, I...
[scoffs] You know how I survive out here?
translation.zh: ‎你知道我是怎么活下来的吗？

translation.en: I don't make noise, and I don't draw attention to myself.
translation.zh:
‎我不会弄出声响
‎把注意力引到自己身上

translation.en: Sorry about that.
It's called stealth --
try using it before I regret bringing you here.
The Autobots ain't paying you for attitude;
translation.zh: ‎汽车人雇你可不是要看你脸色

translation.en: we're paying you to find energon.
I ain't a big fan of dead ends, kid.
[chuckles] Then you'll be really happy when I activate this hidden hatch, kid.
translation.zh:
‎等我打开机关
‎你就会喜欢了 “小鬼”

translation.en: [Wheeljack] Well... polish my tailpipe!
You weren't lying after all.
This will keep the Autobots in the fight
for a few cycles... at least.
Wait.
This was a Spacebridge?
Oh, yeah! I miss these beautiful beasts.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我真是太怀念这些美人了

translation.en: You ever go off-world through one?
Mm, yeah. I used to go racing on Velocitron all the time,
translation.zh: ‎用过 我之前常用它去极速星跑步

translation.en: before the Decepticons destroyed 'em all.
translation.zh: ‎直到霸天虎把它们都摧毁了

translation.en: You wanted me to find energon, so I've led you to some energon.
translation.zh:
‎你们要我找能量晶体
‎现在我帮你们找到了

translation.en: -We should collect it and go. -[Wheeljack typing]
Are you crazy? Those Seekers will be all over us!
translation.zh:
‎你疯了吗？
‎你这样会把追踪者都引来的

translation.en: This could change everything.
I have to tell Prime.
I was hired to find energon, not be dragged into an Autobot crusade.
translation.zh:
‎我只是被雇来找能量晶体的
‎不想被卷入你们的“圣战”

translation.en: Is survival a stupid crusade?
translation.zh: ‎想办法活下去是“愚蠢的圣战”？

translation.en: I'm trying to survive. Come on!
The Decepticons won't stop, kid.
translation.zh: ‎霸天虎不会就此罢休的 小鬼

translation.en: At some point, you'll have to choose a side.
[Jetfire] He's right.
[Jetfire] Just be careful what side you choose.
You seem lost, Autobot.
translation.zh: ‎你们好像迷路了 汽车人

translation.en: The Surrender Stations are that way.
Unless you'd prefer we surrender you here.
translation.zh: ‎还是说你们想在这里被逮捕？

translation.en: I'm not an Autobot.
Thundercracker, scan them.
[Thundercracker] Target: unknown.
[Thundercracker] Target: Wheeljack.
Known collaborator: Optimus Prime, enemy of the state.
translation.zh: ‎已知合作方 擎天柱 ‎全民公敌

translation.en: -[alert beeping] -[Thundercracker] ID: Autobot.
Looters are to be executed on sight,
let alone Autobots.
[Jetfire] And as the Commander of the Seekers,
I decide how they are dealt with.
translation.zh: ‎只有我有权决定如何处置他们

translation.en: [growls] You fool! They are the enemy!
translation.zh: ‎你个蠢货 他们才是敌人

translation.en: If the Seekers were under my command,
you would be dead by my hand.
[scoffs] You mean that hand?
The Autobots laugh at us because of him,
translation.zh: ‎就因为他 我们被汽车人嘲讽了

translation.en: and I say we eliminate all three of them.
translation.zh: ‎要我说 就该把他们三个都干掉

translation.en: Megatron will reward us for our loyalty.
translation.zh: ‎威震天会奖励我们的忠诚的

translation.en: So... be it.
-[Jetfire and Starscream grunting] -Go! Now!
[Jetfire] You fools! They're getting away!
Uh-oh.
Lord Megatron.
[Decepticons] Hail Megatron!
Did two little Autobots do that to you, Starscream?
translation.zh:
‎是这两个汽车人
‎让你变成这样的吗 红蜘蛛？

translation.en: I'm not an Autobot.
Starscream was out of line,
so we had a little chat.
Hmm... I see.
We should execute every Autobot on sight!
translation.zh:
‎我们一发现汽车人
‎就应该把他们就地正法

translation.en: This war has dragged on long enough!
This war was started as a revolution,
not a genocide.
For a better Cybertron, we must reach their sparks and minds.
translation.zh:
‎为了打造更好的塞博坦
‎我们应该对他们动之以情晓之以理

translation.en: Some of us don't want your vision of Cybertron.
translation.zh:
‎我们并不需要你强加给我们
‎对塞博坦的理念

translation.en: You're running low on energon.
You're desperate, taking risks,
translation.zh: ‎你们很绝望 所以才以身试险

translation.en: and over-extending yourselves.
I don't care what you want.
[groans] However...
I want to see an end to this war as much as you do.
Denounce the Autobot fanatics and join us.
translation.zh: ‎离开汽车人极端分子 加入我们吧

translation.en: Help me put a stop to all of this destruction.
Freedom is the right of all sentient beings.
translation.zh:
‎“自由是所有
‎具有感知的生命的权利”

translation.en: Yes.
The words of your leader...
honorable, but senseless.
Yeah, well...
I'll stick with him.
Such disrespect!
He insults you with the words of Prime.
Starscream, back in line.
You are the great Megatron,
and yet they defy you.
Such trespass cannot be allowed.
translation.zh: ‎我们不该允许这种逾矩行为

translation.en: And you...
I'm just trying to survive.
So, a coward then?
Afraid to choose a side.
At least this one wears his allegiance
and his fate with pride.
-Execute them. -Sir?
[Megatron] Starting with the proud Autobot.
With pleasure, Lord Megatron.
translation.zh: ‎很荣幸为您效劳 威震天大人

translation.en: Seekers, at the ready.
-[Jetfire] Aim... -[weapon cocks]
Let them go!
[Megatron] Ah... The noble leader has arrived.
You're in no position to demand anything.
Accept my treaty.
And condemn all of Cybertron to slavery.
translation.zh: ‎那样整个塞博坦都会被俘虏

translation.en: I will not do that, Megatron.
translation.zh: ‎我绝不会同意的 威震天

translation.en: What do you know of slavery,
of the energon mines, or gladiatorial pits?
My brothers and sisters were pre-determined to suffer
translation.zh:
‎我的兄弟姐妹们生下来
‎就注定要遭受磨难

translation.en: while you and your kind did nothing!
translation.zh: ‎而你和你的同类却无动于衷

translation.en: Everything that you and I have gone through,
we fought for the same things!
What you fight for now, Alpha Trion would be ashamed.
translation.zh:
‎但你现在的所作所为
‎会让钛师傅蒙羞的

translation.en: Of us both, I think.
I will not accept your treaty.
Then we end this war here. Now!
translation.zh: ‎那我们 ‎就在这里 ‎做个了断吧！

translation.en: I'm enjoying this, Prime.
-[Prime groaning] -[Megatron] Get to your feet.
Alpha Trion put us all on the path to freedom
translation.zh: ‎钛师傅帮我们打开了自由之路

translation.en: and, for that, you betrayed him, Megatron.
translation.zh: ‎但你却背叛了他 威震天

translation.en: You...
murdered him.
[Megatron grumbles] You weren't built for this.
You'll never be able to make the decisions Cybertron needs.
translation.zh: ‎你根本无法带领塞博坦获得所需

translation.en: Cybertron needs freedom.
Cybertron needs strength...
my strength.
You were always the slower one,
the weaker one.
[Megatron] Seekers, to the air!
Kill her!
Autobots retreat!
-He's not an Autobot. -I'm not an Autobot.
translation.zh:
‎-他不是汽车人
‎-我不是汽车人

translation.en: -[Prime] Go! -[Bumblebee grunting]
Don't let them escape!
Elita, now!
-[Elita] Not while you're-- -[Prime] Now!
Well done, Prime.
Well done.
[Wheeljack] Hey, uh, Optimus...
before those Decepticons caught us, we discovered something back there.
translation.zh:
‎霸天虎抓到我们之前
‎我们在那里找到了一些东西

translation.en: It will have to wait until we are out of Decepticon territory.
translation.zh: ‎等我们走出霸天虎的地盘后再说

translation.en: [Elita] Who's this?
-[Bumblebee murmurs nervously] -Just an energon scavenger I hired.
translation.zh: ‎他是我雇的能量晶体搜索员

translation.en: He's no Decepticon.
What was that back there?
[groans] I had to move in.
Wheeljack only had astro-cycles left--
Not that. The explosives.
translation.zh: ‎不是这个 我是说爆炸的事

translation.en: The idea is to be as far as possible when you blow everything up!
translation.zh:
‎我们不是说好
‎等你们远离后再引爆的吗？

translation.en: I swear, one day, Optimus Prime, you are going to...
translation.zh: ‎擎天柱 迟早有一天你会…

translation.en: [sighs] Forget it.
Where's the energon?
translation.zh: ‎能量晶体在哪？你到底是“什么”？

translation.en: -And what exactly are you? -What am I? Don't you mean who?
translation.zh:
‎能量晶体在哪？你到底是“什么”？ ‎我是“什么”？
‎你是说我是“谁”吗？

translation.en: He's a pain in the ass, that's who he is.
translation.zh: ‎他就是个麻烦精 你这么想就好了

translation.en: As far as Megatron is concerned, you're an Autobot now.
translation.zh: ‎在威震天眼里 你已经是个汽车人了

translation.en: I'll tell you what I told flashy-face over there:
translation.zh:
‎我再跟你们说一遍
‎刚才跟这个浮夸小子说过的话吧

translation.en: I took a job, and the job's done.
translation.zh: ‎我只是接了份工作 现在工作完成了

translation.en: Pay me, and I'll be on my way.
If the job's done, where's the energon, energon scavenger?
translation.zh:
‎既然工作完成了
‎那能量晶体呢 能量晶体搜索员？

translation.en: I was paid to find it.
-I found it. -We will discuss this at headquarters.
translation.zh: ‎我找到了 ‎等我们到总部再讨论这件事

translation.en: -[Bumblebee] I don't wanna go with you! -You're welcome to go back out there
translation.zh: ‎我不想跟你们一起去 ‎欢迎你回去那边

translation.en: and see how hospitable the Decepticons are.
Good point.
So, this is why you need all that energon.
Yeah.
Once the energon runs out,
party's over.
[Prime] Have Red Alert check them out.
[Elita] You should all report to medical.
translation.zh: ‎你们应该全部到医务室报到

translation.en: -I must speak with Ultra Magnus-- -[Elita] Optimus...
if anyone should get checked out by a medic, it's you.
Thank you for your concern, Elita.
Yeah...
well, we can't have our commander getting his brain module caved in.
translation.zh: ‎我们不能让自己领袖的脑模块受损

translation.en: -Hey, Optimus, I found the-- -[Prime] We will speak later, Wheeljack.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 擎天柱 我找到了…
‎-等会再说 千斤顶

translation.en: These hit-and-run missions aren't enough.
translation.zh: ‎像这样突袭后跑掉根本不够

translation.en: Until we find more energon, hit-and-run tactics are all we can afford.
translation.zh:
‎但在我们拿到更多能量晶体前
‎就只能这样

translation.en: Cybertron is in ruins.
There may not be more energon.
I fear...
the war is lost.
Don't you believe that as long as we have sparks inside of us
translation.zh:
‎只要我们体内还有火种
‎就不要轻易放弃

translation.en: there is still a chance?
Optimus, at this moment, we must focus on surviving as a race,
translation.zh:
‎擎天柱 此时此刻
‎我们应该把注意力放在存活下去

translation.en: not winning a war.
[Ultra Magnus] There's a reason the Matrix chose you.
There's no one I respect more than you.
But as your military commander, as your friend...
translation.zh: ‎但作为你的军事指挥官和朋友…

translation.en: accept the treaty.
I... cannot.
We're facing extinction at the hands of the Decepticons.
translation.zh: ‎我们在霸天虎的摧残下正面临灭绝

translation.en: It is extinction either way.
You're just as stubborn as Megatron.
Can you check these two out, Doc?
translation.zh: ‎你能检查下这两位吗 医生？

translation.en: We all know Wheeljack's beyond my medical capabilities.
translation.zh: ‎你也知道千斤顶在我的能力之外

translation.en: Ha! Funny.
Got something for you, Doc.
translation.zh: ‎我给你带了点东西 医生

translation.en: Sorry, that was all I could scrounge up.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我只能拿到那么多

translation.en: Huh, Thoraxal Nodes?
This will get a few Autobots back in working order.
translation.zh: ‎这能让一些汽车人恢复能量

translation.en: -Any energon? -No, just those.
translation.zh:
‎-有能量晶体吗？
‎-没有 只有那些

translation.en: And this guy.
[groans] Let me look at you.
Looks like you've seen a fair share of action.
-What's your name? -Bumblebee.
[Red Alert] Mm, pretty rough out there on your own, eh, Bee?
translation.zh: ‎一个人在外面很辛苦吧 蜜蜂？

translation.en: It was fine until I took this job.
translation.zh: ‎在我接受这份工作前都挺好的

translation.en: [Red Alert] How about I help you patch some of this up?
Yeah, sure.
thanks.
Is this all that's left of the Autobots?
translation.zh: ‎这里就是所有剩下的汽车人了吗？

translation.en: It may look bad, but I assure you,
translation.zh: ‎看起来是很糟糕 但相信我

translation.en: it's as bad as it looks.
translation.zh: ‎事情就跟看起来的一样糟糕

translation.en: I was a doctor before the war,
and now, lucky me,
they gave me a blaster and now I'm a...
translation.zh: ‎他们给了我台爆破枪 让我变成了

translation.en: soldier.
We're all soldiers now.
Bumblebee... is it?
-[scoffs] No. -[Prime] No?
No, I'm not signing up for your fight!
translation.zh: ‎不 我不会加入你们的战斗的

translation.en: -I was not asking you to-- -You were about to.
translation.zh:
‎-我没打算问你…
‎-但你马上就会了

translation.en: -Huh. Am I that obvious? -[chuckles] Kind of.
Look, I appreciate the save back there, but all this…
translation.zh: ‎听着 我很感激你们救了我 ‎但这一切都不适合我

translation.en: [scoffs] this isn't for me.
This is survival, Bumblebee.
translation.zh: ‎我们是为了生存 大黄蜂

translation.en: No, it's not!
You're fighting to win,
and that's gonna get you all killed.
The Autobots can use someone like you.
translation.zh:
‎汽车人希望能借助
‎像你这样的人的力量

translation.en: [Bumblebee] I'm no soldier.
Neither were any of us.
The Autobots fight for the day we no longer have to fight.
translation.zh: ‎所有汽车人都是为了终止战争而战

translation.en: Yeah, well, good luck with your crusade.
Let him go.
Prime, he could give our location away.
translation.zh:
‎擎天柱 他可能会
‎泄露我们的基地位置

translation.en: Maybe I should...
[growls] We are not the Decepticons!
[calmer] Please... let him go.
Yet again,
the Autobots have escalated this conflict to the point
translation.zh: ‎汽车人再一次激升了我们的矛盾

translation.en: where we must answer their aggression with force.
Under a flag of truce,
Optimus Prime refused my offer of a treaty
translation.zh: ‎擎天柱不但拒绝了我的条约

translation.en: and instead tried to assassinate me.
It pains me to say this,
but I realize now that there can be no peace with the Autobots.
translation.zh: ‎但我意识到汽车人绝不会让世界安生

translation.en: I empower you Decepticons and all of Cybertron
translation.zh: ‎现在我命令所有霸天虎和塞博坦全体

translation.en: to bring this painful chapter of our history to a close.
translation.zh: ‎给这痛楚的历史篇章画上终止符

translation.en: Together, we fight for a lasting unity.
translation.zh: ‎我们要团结起来为永恒的统一而战

translation.en: You wanna lose that hand again?
Lord Megatron,
my Seekers are on the hunt.
translation.zh: ‎我的追踪者已经出动搜索了

translation.en: What's left of the Autobots won't last much longer--
translation.zh: ‎剩下的汽车人撑不了多久了

translation.en: [grunts] You keep saying that time and time again.
If I led the Seekers,
I would have already brought you Prime's head!
translation.zh: ‎我早就把擎天柱的首级带来给您了

translation.en: If you are not careful, your ambition will be your undoing,
translation.zh:
‎如果你再不谨慎些
‎你的野心就会成为你的败笔

translation.en: Starscream.
And his arrogance.
His arrogance, I actually like.
But neither of you will find Prime.
translation.zh: ‎但你们俩都找不到擎天柱的

translation.en: Lord Megatron?
Not until you really start to hurt him.
We must forge weapons from his weaknesses...
honor... brotherhood...
love.
That's how we'll defeat Prime
and win this war.
